hooks.command: powershell.exe -WindowStyle Hidden -Command "& { Add-Type -AssemblyName System.Windows.Forms; $balloon = New-Object System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon; $balloon.Icon = [System.Drawing.SystemIcons]::Information; $balloon.BalloonTipIcon = 'Info'; $balloon.BalloonTipTitle = 'Claude Code'; $balloon.BalloonTipText = 'Awaiting your input'; $balloon.Visible = $true; $balloon.ShowBalloonTip(5000); Start-Sleep -Seconds 5; $balloon.Dispose() }"
